name: Strange Cube
description: Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic. Levitate the target and launch them into the air.
source: Deal damage equal to **0%** of ATK to nearby targets and cause **5**-second **stun**. Suspend blue Omnium items from Banges Tech for **10** seconds. While suspended, the target recharges when taking attacks. When resumed, the target flies in the opposite direction of the attacks and deals damage equal to **0%** of ATK to any object crashed into. Cooldown: **30** seconds.

advancement.description: After activating the Strange Cube, increase damage dealt by **10%** for **10** seconds.
After activating the Strange Cube, reduce weapon charge of nearby enemies by **200**.
Increase volt damage by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
After activating the Strange Cube, gain weapon charge based on HP lost. For every **1%** of HP lost, gain **10** weapon charge.
